1. move to external dir
(cd external)

2. download llama.cpp to external folder
instruction: git clone https://github.com/ggml-org/llama.cpp

3. download model's .gguf file to external/llama.cpp/models folder

4. set modelpath in your program 

    "..\\external\\llama.cpp\\models\\(name of gguf file)"
                
    "../external/llama.cpp//models/(name of gguf file)"
